DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine efficacy cabergoline , long-acting dopamine receptor agonist , body weight blood glucose healthy obese adult . This randomized double-blind placebo control study . Twenty subject randomly assign either placebo cabergoline 16 week . The effect treatment body weight blood glucose insulin level compare treatment versus placebo arm .
DOC.criteria: age 18 55 year BMI 30 40 diabetes , clinically significant medical condition , use medication effect blood glucose body weight
